item.description:
Â 

LOVING HUT JANUARY 2013 VEGAN BUFFET


 On the second Saturday of every month, Loving Hut Chandler (http://lovinghut.us/worcester) holds a $10 all-you-can-eat vegan buffet fundraiser for VegWorcester. 10% is donated to VegWorcester to support local events and outreach!

INVITE YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS to the January 2012 Loving Hut Vegan buffet to try some delicious cruelty-free cuisine and to support our fundraising efforts! THIS IS THE FIRST BUFFET OF 2013! If your New Years resolution was to go vegan, join us and bring friends - the Loving Hut buffet is the place to go for great vegan food and community.

  • This is an (informal meetup) meaning that we won't necessarily be meeting up and all sitting together in formal meetup fashion, but you are invited to attend with friends and family between 12-5pm.

FACEBOOK EVENT INVITE: https://www.facebook.com/events/514569398564438/

For more info:
info@vegworcester.com
http://lovinghut.us/worcester

http://www.vegworcester.com
http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street and come on in!
item.name: Loving Hut's January Vegan Buffet Fundraiser
